row.process:
:PRINT "[START JOBI.CTV.ALLGEMEIN_EXPORTS]==================================" !Aktuellen Jobplannamen ermitteln :SET &SPARENT_NAME#= GET_PARENT_NAME(, &ME_RUNNR#, "ACT")
export UC4_CTV_ERRORSIMULATION=&UC4_CTV_ERRORSIMULATION# export EBENE=&CTVEBENE# export UC4_PARENT=&SPARENT_NAME# export UC4_CTV_SONDERLAUF=&UC4_CTV_SONDERLAUF#
echo '$UC4_CTV_ERRORSIMULATION: '$UC4_CTV_ERRORSIMULATION echo '$EBENE: '$EBENE echo '$UC4_PARENT: '$UC4_PARENT echo '$UC4_CTV_SONDERLAUF: '$UC4_CTV_SONDERLAUF
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.CTV.PARAMETER,"ALLGEMEIN*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &PARAM_SWITCH# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND# , 2) : SET &PARAM_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND# , 3) : SET &PARAM_VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND# , 4) : IF &PARAM_SWITCH# = "J" export &PARAM_NAME#=&PARAM_VALUE# echo '$&PARAM_NAME#: '&PARAM_VALUE# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :PRINT "===================================[ENDE JOBI.CTV.ALLGEMEIN_EXPORTS]"
